name: Space Jump Cat
description: This is a classic timekiller in a space setting. You need to keep going for as long as possible collecting the emerging crystals. Dont fly to open space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 200 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM Storage: 200 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
